sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { cloudinaryService } from '../services/cloudinaryService' export const UserEdit = () => { const [img, setImg] = useState({ imgUrl: null, height: '40px', width: '100%', isUploading: false }) const uploadImg = async (ev) => { setImg({ ...img, isUploading: true, height: 500, width: 500 }) const { secure_url, height, width } = await cloudinaryService.uploadImg(ev) setImg({ isUploading: false, imgUrl: secure_url, height, width }) } const uploadMsg = () => { const { imgUrl, isUploading } = img if (imgUrl) return 'UPLOADED' return isUploading ? 'UPLOADING...' : 'CHANGE PHOTO' } return (
Change Info
Changes will be reflected to every services
) }
